nodes.text: Harra the Hutt's stronghold was a stronghold owned by Harra the Hutt on the planet Vodran. The Fold, the Bad Place, and the Garage were all located in the stronghold. By 34 ABY the stronghold was occupied by a First Order military detachment led by Commander Wanten and used as a First Order detention center. Among the First Order prisoners were Cost Niktur, Ymmoss, an unidentified Flann, Mattis Banz, and Lorica Demaris, the latter two being members of the Resistance's J-Squadron.
